services.name: Academic Genealogy Website
services.description: A Django-based web application for UC Davis Computer Science, allowing users to view and manage their academic genealogy within the department. The project includes a user-friendly interface (Bootstrap UI), JSON files integration, and scalable infrastructure.

services.name: Personal Portfolio Website
services.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills. The project is built using React, and is hosted on AWS Amplify and Github page. The website is designed to be responsive for mobile and desktop and user-friendly, with a focus on AWS infrastructure and AWS scalability.

services.name: Rivalry Clash
services.description: A Real Time Strategy game built using Unity. The project is designed to be played on desktop, coming soon to mobile. The game features a user-friendly interface, and is designed to be scalable for future updates.

services.name: Pirates in Peril
services.description: A 2D platformer game built using Unity. The project is designed to be played on desktop, and features a user-friendly interface, and is designed to be with multiple players. The game is my first game project, aiming to learn the basics of Unity and game development.

services.name: Prosecutor
services.description: PROSECUTOR is a isometric investigative game where players take on the role of a prosecutor, gathering evidence and interviewing witnesses to build a case against a suspect. The game is still in development pitch, and is designed to be played on desktop.
